review: I thought about getting a Roku 3, and after reading many articles and reviews, decided to go with the Amazon Fire TV.  This is one of the greatest decisions I've ever made.  Sometimes I have buyer's remorse.  For instance, one time I decided to buy a kidney on the black market, but it turned out to be a scam.  This purchase was practically the antithesis of that one, and I have much less regret!  If you buy one of these things, it'll change your life in all the right ways.
